QuadCross

2014-09-09 00:00:00 -0400

The Blue Hills Race Team kicked off the 2014 CX season in Maynard, MA this past Sunday at the 8th annual QuadCross CX Race. Congrats to Mike Morse for a win in the Men 4/5 race!

QuadCross (Sep 7, 2014)
John Golden MEN CAT 1/2/3 24/33
Kevin Brandt MEN CAT 1/2/3/4 Masters 40+ 13/36
Mike Morse MEN CAT 4/5 1/33
Brian Albert MEN CAT 4/5 26/33
John Fice MEN CAT 4/5 35+ 31/67
Mark Brownell MEN CAT 4/5 35+ 39/67
Patricia Brownell CAT 3/4 Women 14/43
